org.descripter.js.api

Class Function<W extends Script<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.descripter.js.api.Context<Key,java.lang.Object,W>
      • org.descripter.js.api.Objective<CObject>
        • org.descripter.js.api.core.CObject
          • org.descripter.js.api.Function<W>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Array_, Boolean_, Date_, Error_, Function_, Number_, Object_, RegExp_, Script.MyFunction, String_, SyntaxError_, TypeError_, URIError_

    public abstract class Function<W extends Script<?>>
extends CObject

    An abstract class of Script Contexts to emulate function declaration in JavaScript.

    Since:
    Descripter 1.0
    Author:
    J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.descripter.org
